body_html: @asimshankar Because I have c++ code I want to reuse in a new project. I don't know if it is worth rewriting old code for python or wait for c++ API in order to use tensorflow. is it there an estimated time for when c++ API is going to usable for training ? How can we contribute to this end ?

body: @asimshankar Because I have c++ code I want to reuse in a new project. I don't know if it is worth rewriting old code for python or wait for c++ API in order to use tensorflow. is it there an estimated time for when c++ API is going to usable for training ? How can we contribute to this end ?
